about_the_game:
Raceborn is an exhilarating racing game where players control miniature cars across a variety of vibrant locations. Each track offers unique challenges and opportunities for racers to demonstrate their skills. The game emphasizes creativity and customization, allowing players to fine-tune their vehicles with a wide range of upgrades and modifications. As players win races on three distinct locations and numerous tracks, they unlock new enhancements, further personalizing their cars. Raceborn combines fast-paced action with deep customization, providing an engaging and dynamic racing experience.



Key Features:

  • Diverse Tracks:

     Compete on a variety of tracks across three unique locations, each with its own distinct challenges.

  • Extensive Customization:

     Customize your miniature cars with a vast array of upgrades and modifications to enhance performance and style.

  • Progression System:

     Earn upgrades and new parts by winning races, allowing for continuous improvement and personalization of your vehicles.

  • Creative Gameplay:

     Express your creativity through the detailed customization options, making your car truly unique.
detailed_description:
Feature List


About the Game



Raceborn is an exhilarating racing game where players control miniature cars across a variety of vibrant locations. Each track offers unique challenges and opportunities for racers to demonstrate their skills. The game emphasizes creativity and customization, allowing players to fine-tune their vehicles with a wide range of upgrades and modifications. As players win races on three distinct locations and numerous tracks, they unlock new enhancements, further personalizing their cars. Raceborn combines fast-paced action with deep customization, providing an engaging and dynamic racing experience.



Key Features:

  • Diverse Tracks:

     Compete on a variety of tracks across three unique locations, each with its own distinct challenges.

  • Extensive Customization:

     Customize your miniature cars with a vast array of upgrades and modifications to enhance performance and style.

  • Progression System:

     Earn upgrades and new parts by winning races, allowing for continuous improvement and personalization of your vehicles.

  • Creative Gameplay:

     Express your creativity through the detailed customization options, making your car truly unique.
name: Raceborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Raceborn is a racing game featuring miniature cars in diverse locations with extensive vehicle customization options. Win races, earn upgrades, and showcase your creativity to become a racing legend.
